# IPEDS Demographic Data/2024 Election Results Exploratory Analysis and Visualization

```{r}

# plotly instead of ggplot2!!

# Read data
ipeds_demographic_data <- read.csv("../Cleaned data/Cleaned_ipeds_state_demographics.csv")
ipeds_demographic_data_2024 <- read.csv("../Cleaned data/Cleaned_ipeds_state_demographics_2024.csv")
ipeds_state_summary <- read.csv("../Cleaned data/Cleaned_ipeds_summary_state_demographics.csv")
ipeds_state_totals <- read.csv("../Cleaned data/Cleaned_ipeds_totals_summary_state_demographics.csv")
presidential_election_results <- read.csv("../Cleaned data/Cleaned_2024_election_results.csv")

# Create a list of all the datasets for initial cleaning
dfs  <- list(ipeds_demographic_data, ipeds_demographic_data_2024, ipeds_state_summary, ipeds_state_totals, presidential_election_results)

# Replace . with _ in column labels
dfs <- lapply(dfs, function(df) {
    names(df) <- gsub("\\.", "_", names(df))
    df
})

## 2024 IPEDS Demographic Data ##

# See N/A Values by column
summary(ipeds_demographic_data_2024)

# Box plot: overall distribution 


```

```{r}

# Box plot: enrollment by race/ethnicity
(MyL1<-ggplot(ipeds_demographic_data_2024, aes(x=Completion_Year, y=Total,fill=State))+
    geom_boxplot()+
    geom_jitter(position=position_jitter(.01), aes(color=Completion_Year))+
  ggtitle("Degrees granted by year"))
```
